DOC.brief_summary: Patients undergoing open appendectomy for acute appendicitis were enrolled in a randomized prospective study.
DOC.brief_title: Perioperative Hyperoxygenation and Wound Site Infection Following Surgery for Acute Appendicitis
DOC.criteria: Consent was given 15 years old or older Underwent acute appendicitis Lack of follow up Younger than 15 years Not eligible according to physician decision
